title: Alia Bhatt not doing biopic on Pakistani singer Nazia Hasan
text: Alia Bhatt not doing biopic on Pakistani singer Nazia Hasan Wednesday, 14 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Actress Alia Bhatt has denied reports of being a part of Pakistan i singer Nazia Hasan's biopic. MUMBAI: Bollywood star Alia Bhatt wants to do a biopic on Pakistani famous singer Nazia Hassan, TheNewsTribe.com learnt from Indian media. Bollywood beauty said... The News Tribe 22 hours ago - World *New Delhi, Oct.13 (ANI): Alia Bhatt, who will be next seen in Vikas Bahl's directorial Shaandaar, has expressed a desire to do a biopic on Pakistani singer...
